definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

sentences.english: The boys and girls danced to the disco music.
sentences.chinese: 少男少女们跟着迪斯科音乐跳舞。

sentences.english: The young girls and boys boogied all night long.
sentences.chinese: 那些少男少女跳了个通宵的迪斯科舞。

sentences.english: The craze of young pop song fans constitutes a serious social problem.
sentences.chinese: 少男少女追星现象是一个严重的社会问题。

sentences.english: She feels that she is a little different from other teens.
sentences.chinese: 她发现自己和其他少男少女有点不同。

sentences.english: A group of young boys and (young) girls are dancing on the meadow below the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一群少男少女在山下的草地上跳舞。

sentences.english: Is such a scheme guarantee goys and girls free of negative effects?
sentences.chinese: 这样的计划能否保护少男少女，避免遭受消极的影响？

sentences.english: I am past writing angst songs for kids .
sentences.chinese: 我已经不再给少男少女写抒发焦虑的歌。

sentences.english: During adolescence, boys and girls will take on secondary sexual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 到了青春期，少男少女们会出现副性征。

sentences.english: Boys and girls like it when the soul of a daze, erratic, to come and go without a trace.
sentences.chinese: 它就像少男少女发呆时的灵魂，飘忽不定，来去无踪。

sentences.english: Do not feel sorry for the teenagers who are thus manipulated by brands.
sentences.chinese: 不要为那些被品牌如此操纵的少男少女感到难过。

definition: first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
a girl's teenage years (idiom); maidenhood/a budding beauty
(of a girl) in the prime of youth
young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
